text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Pulmonary Hypertension

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    10964002 Progressive pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    11399002 Pulmonary hypertensive arterial disease (disorder)
    155328008 Pulmonary hypertension (& [primary]) (disorder)
    194888002 Secondary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233815004 Persistent pulmonary hypertension of the newborn (disorder)
    233941006 Solitary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233942004 Small vessel pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233943009 Sporadic primary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233944003 Familial primary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233945002 Pulmonary hypertension caused by drug (disorder)
    233946001 Large vessel pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233947005 Thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233948000 Post-arteritic pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    233949008 Pulmonary capillary hemangiomatosis (disorder)
    233950008 Pulmonary hypertension associated with chronic underventilation (disorder)
    233954004 High altitude pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    234161007 Familial pulmonary capillary hemangiomatosis (disorder)
    26174007 Primary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    266293003 Pulmonary hypertension (& [primary]) (disorder)
    276792008 Pulmonary hypertension with extreme obesity (disorder)
    276793003 Pulmonary hypertension with occult mitral stenosis (disorder)
    276794009 Facultative pulmonary hypertension with shunt at atrial level (disorder)
    360573001 Post-capillary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    360578005 Pulmonary hypertension secondary to raised pulmonary vascular resistance (disorder)
    445237003 Portopulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    445928005 Eisenmenger's syndrome (disorder)
    472757001 Pulmonary venous hypertension as complication of procedure (disorder)
    472758006 Pulmonary venous hypertension due to compression of pulmonary great vein (disorder)
    472759003 Pulmonary venous hypertension due to compression of pulmonary great vein by sclerosing mediastinitis (disorder)
    472760008 Pulmonary venous hypertension due to compression of pulmonary great vein by lymphadenopathy (disorder)
    472761007 Pulmonary venous hypertension due to compression of pulmonary great vein by neoplasm (disorder)
    472790001 Pulmonary venous hypertension due to disorder of left heart (disorder)
    5499009 Pulmonary hypertensive venous disease (disorder)
    697896007 Precapillary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    697897003 Heritable pulmonary arterial hypertension (disorder)
    697898008 Idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension (disorder)
    697899000 Heritable pulmonary arterial hypertension due to bone morphogenetic protein receptor type II mutation (disorder)
    697900005 Heritable pulmonary arterial hypertension due to activin A receptor type II-like kinase 1 or endoglin mutation (disorder)
    697901009 Pulmonary arterial hypertension caused by toxin (disorder)
    697902002 Associated pulmonary arterial hypertension (disorder)
    697903007 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with connective tissue disease (disorder)
    697904001 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with human immunodeficiency virus infection (disorder)
    697905000 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with congenital heart disease (disorder)
    697906004 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with congenital systemic-to-pulmonary shunt (disorder)
    697907008 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with schistosomiasis (disorder)
    697908003 Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with chronic hemolytic anemia (disorder)
    697909006 Pulmonary veno-occlusive disease and/or pulmonary capillary hemangiomatosis (disorder)
    697910001 Pulmonary hypertension due to lung disease and/or hypoxia (disorder)
    697911002 Pulmonary hypertension due to chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (disorder)
    697912009 Pulmonary hypertension due to interstitial lung disease (disorder)
    697913004 Pulmonary hypertension due to pulmonary disease with mixed restrictive and obstructive pattern (disorder)
    697914005 Pulmonary hypertension due to sleep-disordered breathing (disorder)
    697915006 Pulmonary hypertension due to alveolar hypoventilation disorder (disorder)
    697916007 Pulmonary hypertension due to developmental abnormality of the lung (disorder)
    697917003 Pulmonary hypertension due to hematological disorder (disorder)
    697918008 Pulmonary hypertension due to myeloproliferative disorder (disorder)
    697919000 Pulmonary hypertension due to post-splenectomy hematological disorder (disorder)

    697924002 Pulmonary hypertension in neurofibromatosis (disorder)
    697925001 Pulmonary hypertension due to systolic systemic ventricular dysfunction (disorder)
    697926000 Pulmonary hypertension due to diastolic systemic ventricular dysfunction (disorder)
    697927009 Pulmonary hypertension due to left-sided valvular heart disease (disorder)

    70995007 Pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    720575002 Braddock syndrome (disorder)

    87394009 Episodic pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
    88223008 Secondary pulmonary hypertension (disorder)
